title: Inspiration Station
subText: It’s play time! Families get hands-on with educational exhibits, games, and books.

paragraph.title: NULL
paragraph.text: Ogle at our Big Baby, the ‘It’ Monster, and the ever-changing display of Delectable Collectables at Inspiration Station Discovery Centre. Fun art and history activities include playing shop in the Kiwi Corner Store, and creating a Flash New You with our funky range of dress ups.
